product_name: Kitchen food scale (10kg/1g) Digital Display
description:
NOTE: Orders made after 10 Sep 2021 205pm will be sent 10Kg scales instead of 5Kg. Scale has upgraded sensors.
2 Years Distributor warranty. Warranty starts from date that item is delivered.
These are high quality digital scale suitable for measurements up to 10KG. Comes with Tare function, so you can zero out the scale with your container on the scale and read only the weight of the flour or eggs or butter that you need to measure.
Portable and suitable for  food,  cooking, baking, postage usage, with high accuracy
Please see photos for dimensions of the kitchen scales.
Silver and Rose Gold scales ----------------------------------------------------Unit of measure that can be selected:  Kg, lb, oz, ml, milk ml, g (Silver and Rose Gold Scales)
Bottom of the scale is white ABS plastic, and the plate is stainless steel.The scale is delivered with 2 layers of blue protective film covering the metal plate.
The USB version has an internal rechargeable battery. It can also operate on 2 pcs of AAA alkaline batteries (Not included)
The battery version operates on 2 pcs of AAA alkaline batteries (included)
There are 4 sensors in this scale, similar to how body scales work. You will need a firm, flat surface to place the scale on. The scale will add up all 4 readings, and show you a total weight for the items you placed on the scale.
This scale comes with programming that displays the weight reading as quickly as possible, so you do not waste time waiting for the scale to display a result. The only time you need to wait for a few seconds is when you press the Tare button. Please press once, and wait for the scale to display zero.
The scale comes in a retail box. The box is professionally designed for shipping, and we will ship the box as it is.
The box is made of corrugated cardboard, which is strong, and protects the contents. Inside the box, the scale is in a clear plastic bag, and sits within 1cm of polyethylene foam all around except the top surface of the scale.
The top surface of the scale is stainless steel, and protected by two layers of protective film against scratching. We will replace any scale damaged during shipping.


White scale-------------------Max capacity: 10kgGraduations: 1 g
Unit of measure that can be selected:  g, oz (White scale)
The white scale is entirely white ABS plastic.
2 x AA batteries are included for the white scale (as of orders from 25 Nov 2021 onwards)

Black scale--------------------Max capacity: 10kgGraduations: 1 g
Unit of measure that can be selected: g, oz, ml, ct, kg, tl, fl:oz, lb
2 x AA batteries are included for the black scale

product_name: Food scale digital kitchen baking cooking weighing scales 3kg/ 0.1g
description:
2 Years Distributor warranty. Warranty starts from date that item is delivered.
This is a high quality digital scale suitable for measurements up to 3KG. Comes with Tare function, so you can zero out the scale with your container on the scale and read only the weight of the flour or eggs or butter that you need to measure.
Two clear plastic square trays are included for measuring small quantity of item, but you can also use your own bowls.
Dimensions of the stainless steel metal plate where you place items to be weighed is 10 x 10 cm.
2 x AAA batteries are included for battery version.The USB version has internal rechargeable battery.
Units of measure are g, gn, oz, ozt, dwt, ct
Wide usage1. measuring ingredients for baking (cakes, mooncakes, pastries)2. counting calories3. checking postage rates for parcels accurately4. measuring ingredients for cooking5. use as pet scale6. jewellery scale

product_name: SG SELLER‚ù§Ô∏èGeneric 10kg LCD Digital Electronic Kitchen Food Diet Scale Weight Balance SF400
description:
The professional Electronic Scale designed for the kitchen, mail room or even your workshop. It has a large round washable tray for routine cleaning. It ensures accurate weighing even in high humidity areas as its splash-proof design. The digital kitchen scale is battery operated, easy to use.

Switchable to Imperial measures (oz) so you can easily refer to any cookbook!
The Tare function lets you measure different ingredients into the same container; at the press of a button the scale will set to 0 at any weight.
You can even set to zero and subtract weight as it shows you how much weight you have removed!
With measurement graduations of 1 gram, this scale provides all the accuracy that is required in the kitchen.

Specification & Features

Equipped with a high precision "strain gauge" sensor
Capacity: 10000g/10kg
Division: 1g
LCD display: 0.6"
Automatic zero re-setting
Automatic switch Off
Low power indicator
Powered by AA batteries
